channel.title: Serial on Noah Glaser
channel.description: Recent content in Serial on Noah Glaser

item.title: ElectroBlocks
item.description: An Arduino IDE that uses Blockly and has a built-in playback simulator. It’s like video editing, but for code. It also allows you to upload code directly to the Arduino board.

item.title: Svelte Arduino LED Matrix
item.description: This website allows you to control and LED matrix directly from the browser. It uses experimental serial api to do this. It was built using svelte framework.
